TopicTitle: Getting vertex positions from existing parts? mk2 and mk3

Articles.Content: It's short: Where can I get mk2 and mk3 fuselage vertex positions so I can build a part that would match correctly?

foreach(Vector3 vertex in this.part.FindModelComponent<MeshFilter>().mesh.vertices)
{
	print(vertex.x + ", " + vertex.y + ", " + vertex.z);
}
